items.title: Operations Manager
items.description: Atlas Logistique - Humanitarian logistics project focused on access, analysis and capacity building in a multi-risk environment.
items.bullets:
- Strategic and operational coordination of Atlas Logistique in Madagascar 

 - Implementation of the IVL tool (Logistics Vulnerability Index) and transfer to the national disaster agency (BNGRC) 

 - Training and capacity building for humanitarian, governmental and private actors 

 - Support for logistics coordination mechanisms (BNGRC, PHSP, WFP, clusters...) 

 - Identification and supervision of access diagnostics in remote areas 

 - Representation, partnership development, and external positioning of HI in humanitarian logistics 

 - Team management and operational planning in a context of logistical constraints and cyclonic risks

items.title: Country Logistics Manager
items.description:
Response to the full-scale invasion of 2022 

 Protection, inclusion, rehabilitation and armed violence reduction missions
items.bullets:
- Management of the logistics team in the capital, and one 3 sites (62 peoples, 8 in direct) 

 - Training and support for nationalization of posts 

 - Logistical support for local partners  

 - Supervision of HR processes (recruitment, appraisals, Supervision and logistical support of projects 

 - Definition of strategies and planning of logistical activities 

 - Supervision of national supply flows and customs clearance operations

items.title: Logistics Head of Department
items.description: Mustisectoral response to support populations and public services affected by the conflict resulting from the full-scale 2022 invasion
items.bullets:
- Supervision of the logistics team in the capital, and support for 4 (then 2) bases in the provinces 
 - Management and leadership of teams (around 15 people) 

 - Training and support for nationalization of posts 

 - Logistical support for local partners  

 - Supervision of HR processes (recruitment, appraisals, Supervision and logistical support of projects 

 - Definition of strategies and planning of logistical activities 

 - Supervision of national supply flows and customs clearance operations

items.title: Country Logistics Coordinator
items.description: Emergency responses to the health needs of populations affected by the conflict on Central African territory
items.bullets:
- Supervision of the logistics team in the capital, and support for two bases in the provinces 

 - Management and leadership of teams (around 25 people), supervision of HR processes (recruitment, appraisals, training), writing of job descriptions 

 - Supervision and logistical support for projects 

 - Definition of strategies and planning of logistical activities 

 - Technical support for a mobile clinic project in an emergency response context 

 - Supervision of the material implementation of security procedures, Supervision of national supply flows, and customs clearance operations Supervision of rehabilitation and construction of health centers Representation and networking (RLH, ClusterLog, NGOs)

items.title: Area Logistics Manager
items.description: Emergency responses to the health needs of populations affected by the conflict on Central African territory
items.bullets: - Supervising and leading a team of a dozen people - Supervising the supply, transport and storage of programme inputs in the province - Monitoring and managing the vehicle, communications and IT fleets - Opening a sub-base as part of an emergency response, and taking part in drawing up and launching a rapid response - Taking part in defining project construction and writing and monitoring budgets - Monitoring security, analysis and monitoring of the security of the base, travel and teams, participation in the drafting of protocols - Coordination of recruitment processes, evaluations and definition of HR needs - Supervision of the rehabilitation and construction of health centres - Training of teams (Excel, Word, stock management, purchasing procedures, etc.), and participation in the drafting of budgets. ..)

items.title: Project Logistics Manager
items.description: Emergency responses to the health needs of populations affected by the conflict on Central African territory
items.bullets:
- Gestion et suivi de stock 

 - Gestion des EPI Covid19 (stock, commande, préparation, suivi) 

 - Approvisionnement 

 - Préparation distribution et intervention 

 - Travail de mise à niveau du parc informatique 

 - Création et mise à niveau protocoles (sorties, stock, achat) 

 - Accompagnement à évaluation de la sécurité

items.title: Legal support for studies and diagnostics
items.description: Support for the regional directorate, in carrying out an exploratory mission on the situation of migrant people in southern Tunisia (Medenine and Tataouine governorates), and work on analysing the equal framework, for carrying out two initial diagnoses on the Tunisian territory
items.bullets: Study on sexual violence and the sexual and reproductive health needs of young people and women with disabilities + Study on the conditions of residence, reception and access to mainstream services for migrants

items.title: Programme coordination support officer
items.bullets:
- Participation in actions to support the capacity building of partners 

 - Support for project monitoring (logical framework, budget, job descriptions, reports) 

 - Redesign of a data collection tool. (defining needs, drawing up specifications, interface, OpenData, security, functionalities) 
Designing a communication plan and a new graphic charter, and assisting with the "digitisation" of certain processes 
Writing and layout of awareness-raising materials, news notes 
Facilitating meetings, team building

items.title: Legal support officer at the civic life centre
items.description: Accompaniment and support in setting up procedures to overhaul public reception areas. Legal studies of the feasibility of partnership projects and long leases

items.title: Chocolate shop assistant
items.description: Welcoming and advising customers, selling and cashing, stocking shelves and respecting product rotation, receiving and preparing orders, monitoring stock levels, producing products.

items.title: Deputy Transport Manager
items.description: Accompaniment and support in setting up procedures to overhaul public reception areas. Legal studies of the feasibility of partnership projects and long leases

items.title: Transport Operations Officer
items.description: Registering and entering departure flows, handling complaints, monitoring and optimising processes, dispatching rounds, inter-departmental coordination

items.title: Material handler
items.description: Receiving and accounting for goods, quality control and sorting of products, repackaging of goods.
